detailsData.title: Real Trial Lawyer
detailsData.content: A lawyer whose track record and presence convey the seriousness of your claim. A tough, experienced, trial-tested advocate ready to battle in court.

detailsData.title: Personal Attention
detailsData.content: Cummings Law provides personal attention and concern, working tirelessly to win your case and bring you justice.

detailsData.title: Medical Malpractice Expert
detailsData.content: Brian Cummings is a board-certified medical malpractice attorney, one of only a handful in Tennessee, with a track record of success.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Services
detailsData.content: From personal injury to medical malpractice, Cummings Law offers a wide range of legal services to meet your needs.

valueProp: If you have suffered a personal injury due to the negligence or misconduct of another, you are legally entitled to receive just compensation. In almost all cases, however, you will have to file a personal injury lawsuit to do so. You’ll need a trustworthy lawyer who works exclusively in this field and so has well-honed skills in personal injury litigation. If you are seeking such a person in Middle Tennessee, the person you’re looking for is Brian Cummings at Cummings Law in Nashville. He is not only highly esteemed, but has a track record of success. He will fight aggressively to win you the compensation you deserve.

testimonalData.text: Cummings Law was amazing. Brian Cummings helped us with a significant personal injury claim. His hard work, constant attention, and legal skill got my wife and I a great settlement.

I was in a major motorcycle accident and was referred to Brian. Thanks to his skill and expertise, he aggressively negotiated with the insurance company and we reached a settlement without having to go court.
Brian is very professional and thorough in meeting our needs. I highly recommend him. Brian knows all aspects of the law and he always kept us informed of everything we needed to know at all times.
